CustomField.formula: IF(TEXT(Interchange__c) = "Yes",(VISA_MC_Domestic_EEA_of_Total__c * Payments_Annual_Value__c * VISA_MC_Domestic_EEA__c) + (VISA_MC_Intl_of_Total__c * Payments_Annual_Value__c * VISA_MC_Intl__c), (VISA_MC_Domestic_EEA_of_Total__c * Payments_Annual_Value__c * (VISA_MC_Domestic_EEA__c - Payment_Card_Charge__r.Visa_MC_Domestic_EEA__c)) + (VISA_MC_Intl_of_Total__c * Payments_Annual_Value__c * (VISA_MC_Intl__c - Payment_Card_Charge__r.Visa_MC_Intl__c)))
CustomField.label: Total V/MC Acq Opportunity
